data.name: AmountChangedAbsolute
data.value: After changing the amount of the document, the cost estimate is posted incorrectly. Please check that the data you entered is correct.

data.name: CalculationInstruction
data.value:
———>Calculation type: ● "Absolute amounts": When choosing this type of distribution, you will need to manually enter the absolute amounts for each required product in rubles. Important! The total amount for all products must be equal to the amount you entered earlier in the CONDITIONS block of this card, accurate to the penny. ● "Percentage": When choosing this type of distribution, you will need to manually enter the distribution percentage for each required product. Important! The total percentage for all products must equal 100. ———>Distribute to: ● "Distribute to products": If you select this type of distribution, the amount will be evenly distributed among all the company's products (devices and licenses). ● "Distribute to devices": If you select this type of distribution, the amount will be evenly distributed among all devices of the company (physical devices). ● "Distribute to licenses": If you select this type of distribution, the amount will be evenly distributed among all licenses for the company's b2b products.
NOTE: When choosing the calculation type as a percentage, the "RESIDUAL:" field is indicated as a percentage.

data.name: AmountChangedPercent
data.value: After changing the amount, the calculation block was recalculated.

data.name: BCRoleDisc
data.value: Workers who replace automatic monitoring of document approvals.

data.name: PATaskInstr
data.value: It is necessary to track the approval of the procurement document by the department of the same name. And complete the task as the document will be successfully approved.

data.name: MCTaskInstr
data.value: By completing this task, you confirm that the documents specified in the fields “Agreement” and “Concluding document” are signed on both sides. Their status will be changed accordingly.

data.name: ProvidePostalInformationInstruction
data.value: Postal information must be provided. Indicate the following in the comment: address, zip code, full name and number of the recipient.
